info.author: Will Breaden Madden
info.description:
spin
====

a small utility to assist in setting usage modes of laptop-tablet
devices

features
========

-  automatic palm rejection when using stylus
-  automatic disable/enable of touchpad and nipple when device toggled
   between laptop and tablet states
-  manual control of display orientation and input devices

setup
=====

This utility requires X11.

Install PyQt5. On Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, run the following:

.. code:: bash

    sudo apt install python-qt5

On Ubuntu 18.04 LTS, run the following:

.. code:: bash

    sudo apt install pyqt5-dev pyqt5-dev-tools

Now install spin by running the following:

.. code:: bash

    sudo pip install python_spin

To set up globally a Linux desktop launcher with icon, execute the
following:

.. code:: bash

    sudo wget --content-disposition -N -P /usr/share/icons/ https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wdbm/spin/master/python_spin/static/spin.svg

    sudo wget --content-disposition -N -P /usr/share/applications/ https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wdbm/spin/master/python_spin/static/spin.desktop

quick start
===========

This utility can be run in its default graphical mode or in a
non-graphical mode. The graphical mode is engaged by running

.. code:: bash

    spin

while the non-graphical mode is engaged by using the option
``--no_GUI``:

.. code:: bash

    spin --no_GUI

There are other options which are described by ``spin --help``.

By default, this utility disables the touchscreen on detecting the
stylus in proximity and it changes between the laptop and tablet modes
on detecting toggling between the laptop and tablet usage
configurations. These default behaviours are provided by both the
graphical and non-graphical modes of this utility. This utility should
be initiated in the laptop usage configuration.

compatibility
=============

+---------------+------------------------+-------------------------------------+
| **computer    | **operating system and | **comment**                         |
| model**       | setup**                |                                     |
+===============+========================+=====================================+
| ThinkPad S1   | Ubuntu 16.04 (X11,     | working                             |
| Yoga          | Unity)                 |                                     |
+---------------+------------------------+-------------------------------------+
| ThinkPad S120 | Ubuntu 16.04 (X11,     | working                             |
| Yoga          | Unity)                 |                                     |
+---------------+------------------------+-------------------------------------+
| ThinkPad Yoga | Ubuntu 16.04 (X11,     | possibly working with some reduced  |
| 14            | Unity)                 | functionality                       |
+---------------+------------------------+-------------------------------------+
| ThinkPad Yoga | Ubuntu 16.04 (X11,     | possibly working                    |
| P40           | Unity)                 |                                     |
+---------------+------------------------+-------------------------------------+

acceleration control
====================

There is an experimental acceleration control included which is
deactivated by default. It can be activated by selecting the appropriate
button in the graphical mode.

future
======

Under consideration is state recording in order to avoid execution of
unnecessary commands and better handling of subprocesses.
